input.sentences: we are starting our tour of diverse architecture .
some structures are plain with a few arches for embellishment .
now it is time to view the mall and its interior design .
sometimes the hangings look like giant christmas ornaments .
you can never tell what is inside a building when you look at the outside .
output.sentences: The structure of this building is very angular.
This building looks very old and looks like a jail to me.
The small castle holding the clock dangling from the ceiling is a show stopper.
I have never seen an ornament like this as a chandelier.
This is a very well structured city.
